newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Soccer-National league premier division fixtures.
newsitem.headline: Soccer-National league premier division fixtures.

text.p: This weekend's National League of Ireland premier division fixtures. All kick-off times are given in GMT. Friday, Sept 13 Bohemians vs St.Patrick's Athletic at Dalymount Park, 1845. Dundalk vs Derry City at Oriel Park, 1845. Shamrock Rovers vs Bray Wanderers at Tolka Park, 1845. Saturday, Sept 14 Finn Harps vs Home Farm/Everton at Finn Park, 1830. Sligo Rovers vs Shelbourne at The Showgrounds, 1830. Sunday, Sept 15 University College Dublin vs Cork City at Belfield Park, 1415. -- Damien Lynch, Dublin Newsroom +353 1 6603377
